name: AI-Powered Chatbot for Customer Support
desc: Developed a chatbot using Natural Language Processing (NLP) and machine learning models, integrated with platforms like Facebook Messenger and WhatsApp, deployed using AWS Lambda.
technologies: Python, TensorFlow, AWS, NLP, Chatbot API

name: E-commerce Website with Dynamic Recommendation Engine
desc: Built an e-commerce platform with a recommendation engine to personalize product suggestions using collaborative and content-based filtering. Deployed on Heroku with secure Stripe payment integration.
technologies: React.js, Node.js, MongoDB, Python, Stripe API

name: Serverless IoT Home Automation System
desc: Created a system to control and monitor home appliances remotely using IoT devices and serverless architecture, integrated with AWS IoT Core, and Google Assistant for voice control.
technologies: AWS IoT, Lambda, MQTT, Python, React Native, Google Assistant

name: Email-Signature-Extraction-with-LLMs
desc: A project that compares Large Language Models (LLMs) like OpenAI's GPT-3.5 turbo and Anthropic Claude 3 for email signature extraction.

name: Restaurant Website
desc: A responsive website template for a restaurant using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript with animations, smooth scrolling, and a dark/light theme.

name: Weather App
desc: A basic weather application built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, integrating an external API to display weather data.

name: Real-time Weather Application
desc: An application displaying real-time weather updates using API integrations.

name: Calculator
desc: A simple calculator application for performing basic arithmetic operations.

desc: A clone of the popular social media platform Instagram, built using React Native and Firebase.

desc: A To-Do list application with task management capabilities.
